title: The United Nations and world disputes

description: Excerpts from newsreels presenting the role of the United Nations in settling disputes in four countries between 1945 and 1950: the Dutch and the new Republic of Indonesia; the Kashmir conflict between India and Pakistan; Count Bernadotte's and Dr Ralph Bunche's mediation in Palestine; and the intervention of the United Nations in Korea resulting in a peaceful settlement of hostilities.
